title: Introductions
description: It would be a nice gesture to introduce yourself around town. Some people might be anxious to meet the new farmer.
rewardtext: 100 Friendship points (0.4 heart) with all 28 NPCs

title: How to Win Friends
description: Giving gifts is a great way to build friendships. Learn each person's individual tastes and you'll be popular in no time.

title: Getting Started
description: If you want to become a farmer & you have to start with the basics. Use your hoe to till the soil & then use a seed packet on the tilled soil to sow a crop. Water every day until the crop is ready for harvest.

title: To The Beach
description: Someone named Willy invited you to visit the beach south of town. He says he has something to give you.
how: Visit the beach south of town before 5:00pm

title: Raising Animals
description: Robin & the local carpenter & lives north of town. In exchange for raw materials and money & she'll construct new buildings on your farm. You'll need her to build a coop or barn so that you can raise animals.

title: Advancement
description: As you gain experience you'll discover new crafting recipes to increase profit and make life easier. A Scarecrow & for example & will prevent crows from snacking on your precious crops.

title: Explore The Mine
description: There's an old mine shaft in the mountains north of town. There could be valuable minerals inside & but Marlon hinted that it might be dangerous.

title: Deeper In The Mine
description: It seems that the mine elevator is still functional. It will allow you to quickly return to any elevator doors you've discovered. A deeper expedition might be in order.

title: To The Bottom?
description: So far & there's no sign of the bottom. How low does it go?

title: Archaeology
description: Gunther asked if you'd consider donating any new artifacts or minerals you find to the museum. He says he'll compensate you by way of occasional rare goods.
when: Enter the Museum with a mineral or artifact in inventory

title: Rat Problem
description: There's something odd going on in the Community Center... Investigate the Community Center
when: Trigger the initial Community Center cutscene by entering Pelican Town from the Bus Stop between 8am and 1pm on a sunny day (Spring 5+)
how: Enter the Community Center and examine the Golden Scroll in the Crafts Room.

title: Meet the Wizard
description: You received a letter from the local wizard. He claims to have information regarding the old community center.
when: The morning after you examine the first golden scroll in the Community Center & you receive a letter from the Wizard saying he has information for you.
rewardtext: The Wizard helps you learn the language of the Junimos.
tags: Wizard, Community Center, Junimos, Craft Room, Quest

title: Forging Ahead
description: If you're going to keep mining you should build a furnace.
when: Morning after collecting a Copper Ore & Clint visits and gives you the Furnace blueprints

title: Smelting
description: Now that you've built a furnace & you can smelt some metal. According to Clint's instructions & if you place 5 copper ore and 1 piece of coal in the furnace & it should produce a copper bar.
how: Use your furnace to smelt a copper bar.

title: Initiation
description: If you can slay 10 slimes & you'll have earned your place in the Adventurer's Guild.
when: Mail morning after reaching level 5 in The Mines
how: 10 Slimes slain in The Mines (Slimes slain in the Secret Woods do not count towards this quest)

title: Robin's Lost Axe
description: Robin lost her favorite axe. The last time she remembers using it & she was cutting wood south of Marnie's ranch.
how: Find Robin's lost axe near Sewer in Forest.

title: Jodi's Request
description: Jodi needs a fresh cauliflower for a recipe she's making. She's asking you to bring her one.

title: Mayor's Shorts
description: Mayor Lewis has lost his purple `shorts`. He's asking you to find and return them...Discreetly.
how: Find and return Mayor Lewis' purple shorts. Can be found in Marnie's bedroom

title: Blackberry Basket
description: It's blackberry season & but Linus can't find his basket! He's asking you to help him find it. He has no idea where it is.
how: Find Linus's basket in the Backwoods near the tunnel.

title: Marnie's Request
description: Marnie came by the farm and asked if you'd bring her a cave carrot. She's trying to train her goats to speak & and cave carrot is their favorite snack.
when: She visits the farm house after you are at 3 Friendship hearts with her
how: Bring a Cave Carrot into Marnie's shop.

title: Pam Is Thirsty
description: Pam is hankerin' for a pale ale. Regular old beer won't do. You can brew one yourself if you have hops and a keg.

title: A Dark Reagent
description: The wizard wants you to descend into the mines and fetch him a Void Essence. He needs it for some kind of dark magic.
how: Bring the Wizard a Void Essence

title: Cow's Delight
description: Marnie wants to give her cows a special treat. She's asking for a single bunch of amaranth.
how: Bring Marnie one bunch of Amaranth.

title: The Skull Key
description: You found a strange looking key in the bottom of the mines.
when: Reach the bottom level of The Mines.
how: Discover the purpose of the Skull Key.

title: Crop Research
description: Demetrius needs a fresh melon for his research.

title: Knee Therapy
description: George needs a hot pepper to soothe his aching knee

title: Robin's Request
description: Robin needs 10 pieces of Hardwood

title: Qi's Challenge
description: You've been challenged to reach level 25 in the skull cavern. You've been promised a substantial reward if you're successful.
when: Received by mail the day after entering the Skull Cavern.
how: Reach level 25 in the Skull Cavern.
rewardtext: 10000 & delivered by mail the next day

title: The Mysterious Qi 1
description: Within a secret lock-box & you found a note with peculiar instructions. It's signed by a 'Mr. Qi'.
when: Put a Battery Pack in the lock-box in the tunnel next to the bus stop.
how: Leave a Rainbow Shell in the box at the train platform.

title: The Mysterious Qi 2
description: You found another note written by `Mr. Qi`. The request is even more unusual this time.
how: Place 10 beets inside Mayor Lewis' fridge.

title: The Mysterious Qi 3
description: You've found yet another strange note within the Mayor's fridge. This time & the instructions are more cryptic.
how: Give the sand dragon his final meal. (Put a Solar Essence in the sand dragon's mouth at The Desert.)

title: The Mysterious Qi 4
description: You found another note in the sand dragon's eye. It seems Mr. Qi's strange scavenger hunt has come to an end.
how: Inspect the lumber pile beside your house.
tags: Club Card, Mr Qi, Casino, Quest

title: Carving Pumpkins
description: Caroline wants to carve a pumpkin with her daughter. She asked you to bring her one from the farm.

title: A Winter Mystery
description: You encountered a suspicious looking figure by the bus stop. When it saw you & it fled toward town. Could there be a clue to its whereabouts?
when: Mail after triggering the cutscene by entering the Bus Stop from the Farm during Winter between 6am and 4pm.
how: Interact with the bush to the right of the playground in Pelican Town

title: Strange Note
description: You found a note & barely legible & asking you to bring `may-pal serrup` to the `seecrit wuds`.
how: Enter the Secret Woods between 6am and 7pm with Maple Syrup in inventory to trigger a cutscene.

title: Cryptic Note
description: You found a note that reads `Someone is waiting for you on level 100 in the Skull Cavern`
how: Reach level 100 of the Skull Cavern

title: Fresh Fruit
description: Emily wants a taste of spring. She's asking for a fresh apricot.

title: Aquatic Research
description: Demetrius is studying the toxin levels of the local pufferfish. He'd like you to bring him one.

title: A Soldier's Star
description: Kent wants to give his wife a starfruit for their anniversary.

title: Mayor's Need
description: Mayor Lewis wants truffle oil. He won't explain what it's for. Maybe it's none of your business.
how: Bring Lewis a bottle of Truffle Oil.

title: Wanted Lobster
description: Gus put out a notice requesting a fresh lobster.

title: Pam Needs Juice
description: Pam's TV remote is dead. She's having a tough time going back and forth between the couch and the TV dial.

title: Fish Casserole
description: Jodi swung by the farm to ask you to dinner at 7:00 PM. Her only request was that you bring a Largemouth Bass for her fish casserole.
when: Event - Jodi at 4 Hearts; Exit the Farmhouse between 6am and 9:30am on a Monday to trigger the event
how: Enter Jodi's house with a Largemouth Bass at 7:00 PM on a day of your choice (not a festival day).

title: Catch a Squid
description: Willy is challenging you to catch a squid. He says you can fish them from the ocean on winter nights.

title: Fish Stew
description: Gus wants to make fish stew & but he needs an albacore.

title: Pierre's Notice
description: Pierre will pay `top coin` to whoever brings him a plate of sashimi. Apparently he's really craving the stuff.

title: Clint's Attempt
description: Clint wants you to give Emily an amethyst. He wants you to tell her it's from him.

title: A Favor For Clint
description: Clint got a new hammer and he wants to test it out on a variety of metals.

title: Staff of Power
description: The Wizard is creating a staff of phenomenal power. Who knows what it's for. He needs an iridium bar to finish it.

title: Granny's Gift
description: Evelyn wants to surprise her husband with a gift.

title: Exotic Spirits
description: Gus wants to make a Coco-no-no & but he's missing the main ingredient.

title: Catch a Lingcod
description: Willy is challenging you to catch a Lingcod.
how: Bring Willy a Lingcod. (Does not have to be caught after accepting the quest)

title: Dark Talisman
description: The Wizard asked me to retrieve the magic ink from his ex-wife's house... but to gain access I'll need a dark talisman. Enter the sewer and ask Krobus about the dark talisman.
when: Railroad cutscene (after completing Community Center or Joja Warehouse tasks)
how: Speak to Krobus and then venture through to the Mutant Bug Lair to retrieve the talisman. Return to the cave at the Railroad with it once it's collected.

title: Goblin Problem
description: There's a goblin blocking the path to the Witch's Hut. There must be some way to get him to move... Perhaps I should seek out more information on Goblins.
when: Cave by Railroad after completing Dark Talisman.
how: Speak to the Henchman outside the Witch's hut and give him Void Mayonnaise as a gift. Take the Magic Ink from the Witch's Hut and give it to the Wizard.
rewardtext: Wizard buildings available. Dark shrines now accessible in Witch's Hut.
tags: Void Mayonnaise, Junimo Hut, Beach Obelisk, Mountain Obelisk, Quest
